name: blitzbot
description: WOT Blitz stat bot for Discord.

scripts.lint: eslint --format tap bin/*.js lib/*.js lib/command/*.js test/*.js test/mocks/*.js | faucet

author: Cody A. Taylor

unreleased: Fixed multi-region support for direct messages.
Added helper for logging sent messages.
Added conveince configuration to select default region.
2.3.8: Fixed parsing of message with multiple spaces between mention and command
2.3.7: Upgrade wotblitz to 1.1.0. Preparing for multi-region support.
2.3.5: Fixed attempt to get permissions for a direct message.
2.3.4: Fixed incorrect sending of messages without permission.
2.3.3: Fixed bug in *tank-win-rate* with long messages.
2.3.1: Fix bug with message parsing in text channels.
2.2.2: Fixed *mastery-list* to include missing tanks instead of crashing.
2.2.0: Add lookup by mention to *tank-win-rate*. Feature in testing!
Fixed *roster* bug when the message author is not in a clan.
Add admin REPL server to allow changes while the bot is live.
2.1.0: Changed the *mastery-list* command to direct message really long lists.
2.0.0: Added very basic history to the `win-rate` command.
Added `mastery-list` "None" option to list tanks without any badge.
Faster clan `roster` command when looking up your own clan multiple times.
Added count and percentage of played tanks to `mastery-list`.
Removed order from the `mastery-list`. Separated entries with a new line.
Added response when the `add` command does not find an account.
Fixed the dash/space issue in `tank-win-rate` vehicle name searching.
Created a new command structure, making the bot more modular.
1.2.6: Added a valid user-agent string so discord tracking knows about blitzbot.
Fixed bug in *tank-win-rate* when looking up a tank that has never been played.
1.2.5: The *tank-win-rate* command now includes battle count.
